c-0: ^I remember I was having a lovely chardonnay while barely listening to that old bastard’s speech. Then I felt heavy and the next thing I know I’m stuck in this room with you.
^Nothing else other than your snoring waking me up.
^Speaking of sounds, I heard a loud slam that woke me up. Did you hear it too or anything else?

^I think I remember hearing a slam, but it was drowned out by your screaming. Thinking about it, there were also some footsteps outside the door. It was probably that old bastard being proud of himself for getting one over on us.
c-1: ^Another one of Garry’s stupid games. He can’t be normal. He has to make a big show of it.
^The last time he came to a party with the representatives he had us all play tag while blindfolded. He called it “A typical senate meeting.
^Just figure a way for us to get out of here already!
c-2: ^You’re guess is as good as mine. I looked outside and didn’t saw a whole lot of nothing.
^It looks like we’re stuck in another one of the old bastard’s play houses until we finish his stupid game.
